name: FL 99
details:
Analog FlangerThe Ibanez FL99 Classic Flange is a rare flanger produced from 1997-1999 by Ibanez featuring the desireable MN3210 chip at the core of its design. The pedal has controls for speed, depth, manual, regeneration, a filter switch (similar to Eric Johnson's sound on 'High Landrons') and an 'intense' footswitch. Unit has true bypass (bypass works when the unit does not have power). 
Speed
controls the speed/rate of the LFO wave that controls the delay time of the flanger
Depth
controls the depth/amplitude of the LFO wave that controls the delay time of the flanger
Manual
controls the center amount of delay of the flanger
Regen
controls the feedback/resonance of the flanger
Filter On/Off
matrix filter function? (Filter on = LFO off?)
More than 23000 guitar effects pedals from 4000 brands: 
http://www.effectsdatabase.com/model/ibanez/classic/fl99
9v DC, ??mA
